forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSW at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with periods of rain. Low 52F. Winds SSW at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 14C. Winds SSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 56F. Winds SSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy...showers and thundershowers in the evening, then variable cloudiness overnight with still a chance of showers. Low near 10C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 80 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy...showers and thundershowers during the evening, then variable clouds overnight with more showers possible. Low 49F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Winds could occasionally gust over 50 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 43F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High around 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain in the morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High near 50F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low near 5C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 40F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny. High 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 53F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies in the evening then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 43F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 56F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 58F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early. A few showers developing later in the day. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 58F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 58F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
